content: elmer t beanie shown in dimond laine elmer tweed worsted in color thermal elmer t beanie by the lamb & kid a simple hat with fun details created to celebrate our tweed merino and cashmere blend the knitting is fun with a half ribbing pattern to start but the magic of this piece is in the blocking the cashmere bloom the unbelievably soft and light fabric that results we dare you to stop at just one hat needles needle sizes are suggested please adjust for your gauge gauge needles us 6 4mm 16 circular and double point needles ribbing needle us 4 3 5mm 16 circular needles notions 2 markers 1 unique to mark beginning of round darning needle gauge 20 stitches and 28 rounds in 4 on stockinette stitch in the round on gauge needle elmer t beanie shown in dimond laine elmer tweed worsted in color thermal finished size approx 18 circumference and 9 tall to fit an average adult head 20-21 in circumference abbreviations materials dimond laine elmer tweed worsted 70% merino 30% to pom half ribbing pattern on your smaller needles and then knit the body of the hat in stockinette stitch the hat is closed quickly at the top with just a few decrease rounds you will use almost all
